Up.Statement:
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM w2_FixedPurchaseForecast) BEGIN DELETE FROM w2_FixedPurchaseForecast; END GO
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_FixedPurchaseForecast' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'delivery_frequency_by_scheduled_shipping_date') BEGIN ALTER TABLE w2_FixedPurchaseForecast ADD delivery_frequency_by_scheduled_shipping_date INT DEFAULT 0; END GO
